subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] more suggestions?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, and here is the same old crapola. Present stuff for consideration and
not one freaking comment on that, always sidetracked on how acceptable other
junk is, or who siad what, or who is pissed off today.

 Always I have to aks, why bother!? I guess so the debunker skepdicks don't
get their way,

 F-S

On Wed, May 26, 2010 at 4:34 PM, Frank Sumption
<purplealiengirl@...>wrote:

>  I'm just sayin'--there are a very few that act like all is known and can
> all be expelaned away. It's those few that make comments back and forth,
> between themselves implying that all this is foolishness, and they know so
> much better. I don't know why why, but that stuff really chaps my hide!
>
>  I know for a fact that some of the voices out of the box, and other
> methods are imagination, as they tend to change from day to as perceptions
> shift. I have stuff form ten years ago that sound the same, and I aslo have
> tapes from the first boxes that talk about what's going on now. I have some
> voice segments for m years ago that are also gibberish and noise.
>
>  I don't need some duffus telling me how I fool myself.
>
>  F-S
>
>
>
>
